trs: (Question: How do ♂I address \forme{a-wa ɯ-xtɤɣ ɯ-ɣe ɯ-ɕki} my father's brother's grandchildren? Response:) `In that case, ♂you say \forme{a-mdɯ} `♂my brother's son'; in the case of a girl's child (FBDCh) you say \forme{a-ftsa} `my sister's son', like [siblings sharing] the same parents.' (elicitation, 2019-11-30)
